page.title: 21Our School 2011
page.content:
Our school is 112 years old. The main building has a Victorian front. There is a block behind built in the sixties and a demountable hut added in the 2000s. A new hall and 2 additional classrooms were added in1994. In 2010 a new computer room was built which has 30 personal computers for the children to use. Each class uses the computers twice a week the rest of the time we write on paper usually in books.

There are around 210 children who attend the school aged between 4 and 11. There are 7 classes each with about 30 children. There are 7 full time teachers and 2 part time, each class has at least one learning support assistant. We have a headteacher, a site manager, and three administrational staff, cleaners, mid-day assistants and two kitchen staff. In 2009 the preschool moved from the village hall to a purpose built hut next to the swimming pool.

We have lots of different clubs in school and after school including football, bedazzle (performing arts), street dance, netball, a choir, dodgeball, multi skills sports club, orienteering, music lessons, gardening and computer club.


Class 2
